Container.Name: electerm-web
Container.Overview:
Open-sourced terminal/ssh/telnet/serialport/RDP/VNC/sftp/ftp client. This is web app version of electerm app, running in browser, almost has the same features as the desktop version.
https://github.com/electerm/electerm https://github.com/electerm/electerm-web
sudo chown -R 1001:1001 /mnt/user/appdata/electerm-web/

Config.Name: HOST
Config.Description: Setting HOST=0.0.0.0 configures the service to listen on all available network interfaces. Default: 0.0.0.0

Config.Name: SERVER_SECRET
Config.Description: SERVER_SECRET is used to encrypt data, if not set, would use default value. Should change some_server_secret to some complicated secret string.

Config.Name: SERVER_PASS
Config.Description: Password to login. Should change password_to_login to some complicated secret string

Config.Name: ENABLE_AUTH
Config.Description: When ENABLE_AUTH enabled, would require login with SERVER_PASS when visit
